text: Thunder and Lightning is a 1977 American action comedy movie directed by Corey Allen and starring Kate Jackson, David Carradine, Sterling Holloway, Patrick Cranshaw, Charles Napier, George Murdock, Ron Feinberg. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 action movies Category:1977 comedy movies Category:American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Corey Allen
title: Thunder and Lightning (movie)
